password.title: Password
password.description: Password to protect access to the validator account manager dashboard. Use a strong password, which you can generate and store with a password manager. You can change this password anytime.

graffiti.title: Graffiti
graffiti.description: You can use the graffiti validator parameter to add a string to your proposed blocks, which will be seen on the block explorer. This can be your name, your loved oneâ€™s name, an important hash of some real world data, or memes. Leave empty to not add any data.
